name: Compressed Virtual World
summary: Learn about .SVR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: SVR files are the compressed versions of the VRT file, which allows for faster download speeds and start-up times.

description: An SVR file is a 3D file format used by SuperScape to create 3D interactive worlds. These three-dimensional interactive worlds can be viewed through web browsers with the SVR plugin. SVR files are similar to VRT file format but are compressed that results in smaller file size. Thus, SVR files are loaded faster and can also be shared over internet.

3D format for creating interactive three-dimensional worlds, which is viewable through web browsers with the Viscape SVR plugin; contains any textures, sounds, geometry data, and behaviors for the interactive 3D world.
